question: I wanted to ask about a hadith in which the prophet(SAW)said that the hellfire willnot touch a person who sees me.
answer:
QUESTION

I wanted to ask about a hadith in which the prophet(SAW)said that the hellfire willnot touch a person who sees me.
Another hadith i read that a person who sees me in a dream will see me on doomsday and
he will get the water from hooze kauser to drink.And hellfire will not touch him.
Now,if a person sees the prophet repeatedly in dreams is he worthy of getting the above mentioned blessings.

thankyou

ANSWER


Share:

1. The first Hadith is reported by Imaam al-Tirmidhi (Hadith3858). Imaam al-Tirmidhi has classified this Hadith as Hasan Gharib (sound).

2. We could not locate the second Hadith. It is hoped that the person will receive the above reward.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
